# Introduction to the Time Function in R

The time function is a powerful tool in R for manipulating and transforming time data. It allows you to handle different representations of time and create new variables out of existing ones. 

## What Package Contains the Time Function?

The time function is found in the **lubridate** package. This package allows you to work with dates and times in R and is part of the tidyverse package family.

## When To Use The Time Function?

The time function is useful when you are working with time objects
